ing: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
des: "This is a great sandwich bread.  Makes a great grilled cheese or Rueben sandwich!  I like to form this bread in a round circle, and bake free form in the la cloche!"
ins:
Place all the ingredients in the bread machine pan in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select Basic or White Bread setting, and start the machine.
